description: Grants the user the ability to trap people in dream worlds and steal their memories. The user can also hypnotize others through direct eye contact and emit memory-stealing sounds when played as an instrument.

users.circumstances: Noko consumed the Nemu Nemu no Mi at an unknown point before the Ocean's Dream Arc

abilityReveals.description: By being played as an instrument, the user emits a low, mournful sound that steals memories from sleeping listeners.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Noko used this ability to steal the Straw Hats' memories while they slept, taking all their memories since joining the crew.

abilityReveals.description: The user can lock eyes with targets to control their actions through hypnosis. The user's eyes glow red when activating this power.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Noko used this ability to control Zoro and Drim, forcing them to act against their will and attack the Straw Hats.

abilityReveals.description: The user creates purple smoke that produces visions of loved ones or enemies to manipulate targets emotionally.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Noko created illusions to confuse and manipulate the Straw Hats during their pursuit.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

weaknesses.description: The hypnotic eye ability can be avoided by closing one's eyes or looking away, limiting its effectiveness in combat.
Strong physical attacks against the user can break the hypnotic control over affected individuals and release stolen memories.

strengths.description: Can steal and store vast amounts of memories from multiple individuals simultaneously.
Hypnotized individuals retain their full combat abilities while under control, making them formidable unwilling combatants.
